title: Nominations Sent to the Senate | The White House
content: Paul K. Martin, of Maryland, to be Inspector General, United States Agency for International Development, vice Ann Calvaresi Barr, resigned.     Martin O’Malley, of Maryland, to be Commissioner of Social Security for the remainder of the term expiring January 19, 2025, vice Andrew M. Saul.     Cardell Kenneth Richardson, Sr., of Virginia, to be Inspector General, Department of State, vice Steve A. Linick.# # #
